AYUD-R.BK.long_name: Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited
AYUD-R.BK.summary: Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Non-life Insurance Business and Investment Business. It offers fire, marine, motor, transportation, travel accident, and miscellaneous insurance products, as well as reinsurance products. The company was formerly known as Sri Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited and changed its name to Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited in April 2019. Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Pathumwan, Thailand.

BKI-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Insurance Public Company Limited engages in the non-life insurance business in Thailand. It provides fire, marine and transportation, motor, travel accident, personal accident, residential and commercial property, health, property, third party liability, business all risks, engineering, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CHARAN-R.BK.summary: Charan Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. It offers fire, marine and transport, personal accident, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company also provides motor, compulsory, marine cargo, SME risks, property, engineering, and other insurance products. Charan Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CHARAN.BK.summary: Charan Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. INSURE-R.BK.summary: Indara Insurance Public Company Limited primarily provides non-life insurance services in Thailand. It offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, personal accident, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company was formerly known as Inter life Insurance Company Limited and changed its name to Indara Insurance Public Company Limited. Indara Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Indara Insurance Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of T.C.C. Land Company Limited.

MTI-R.BK.long_name: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited
MTI-R.BK.summary: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products and services in Thailand. The company offers motor insurance; and non-motor products that include property, marine and transportation, engineering, personal accident and health, special products, liability, and miscellaneous insurance products, as well as travel and commercial insurance products. It also invests in various securities, as well as engages in reinsurance business. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MTI.BK.long_name: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited
MTI.BK.summary: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products and services in Thailand. It also invests in various securities, as well as engages in reinsurance business. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NKI-R.BK.long_name: The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited
NKI-R.BK.summary: The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, and miscellaneous insurance products. It operates through a network of 25 branches. The company was formerly known as Luang Lee Insurance Company Limited and changed its name to The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited in 1985. The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NKI.BK.long_name: The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited

NSI-R.BK.long_name: Nam Seng Insurance Public Company Limited
NSI-R.BK.summary: Nam Seng Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Motor Insurance and Others Insurance. The company offers fire insurance; motor insurance comprising compulsory and voluntary insurance; marine and transportation insurance that provides coverage for losses and damages to hull and the transported cargo; and miscellaneous insurance products covering burglary, public-liability, contract-work, golfer's indemnity, etc. It is also involved in the reinsurance business; and investing in financial instruments, including bonds and others. The company operates 26 sub-branches in Bangkok. Nam Seng Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMK-R.BK.short_name: SYN MUN KONG INSURANCE PUBLIC C
SMK-R.BK.long_name: Syn Mun Kong Insurance Public Company Limited
SMK-R.BK.summary: Syn Mun Kong Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, and miscellaneous insurance products, as well as accident insurance. It operates through 166 branches. Syn Mun Kong Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TIP-R.BK.summary: Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company offers fire, marine and transport, motor, aviation, and miscellaneous insurance products, including accident, travel, health, cancer, public property, loyalty, burglary, golf, machinery, aircraft, financial, and responsibility insurance, as well as insurance to cover broken contracts for construction/installations. Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSI-R.BK.long_name: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited
TSI-R.BK.summary: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited engages in the non-life insurance business in Thailand. It offers fire, property risk, marine and transportation, motor cargo, and engineering insurance, as well as miscellaneous insurance products. The company also provides car, accident, travel, and home and condo insurance products. It serves to individual and corporate customers. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TVI-R.BK.summary: Thaivivat Insurance Public Company Limited engages in non-life insurance business in Thailand. Thaivivat Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
